website_summaries.verdict: Sennheiser's Urbanite on-ear headphone pair offers a rewarding, rich sound signature, with a perfect balance of slightly boosted bass and well-defined mids and highs.
pros: Excellent, balanced audio performance with crisp highs and rich, powerful bass response
cons: Not for those seeking super-mega-bass sound

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good, they're fairly comfy but sit quite big on your head (I've got quite a small head though). Main gripe is quality, they seem to be built well but the first pair I was sent started to get the material on the ear bit flaking off within a week. Amazon sent me a new pair, which have been fine for a couple months now until today when one of the padded bits came off and I've lost it. Also, the sound has been crackling the last two months when I move the cable or my phone, which is quite annoying when you're walking with your phone in your pocket or at the gym!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Turner

customer_reviews.title: ... to get these at £70 which was an absolutely great deal. Had an audiophile friend confirm that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Managed to get these at £70 which was an absolutely great deal. Had an audiophile friend confirm that the sound quality is up there with £100+ headphones. The sound is quite bassy, not in a bad way like cheap headphones though. A bit like beats headphones I guess, but far better value for money because you aren't paying a premium for the fashion brand
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: best sounding headphones I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: these headphones are top notch. the build is fantastic, they look stunning, better than in photos. the sound is warm, realistic, well balanced, with the right amount of bass (which is plenty, make no mistake). however, they are bigger than I thought - I purchased them as portable headphones for my sony NWZ-A15 player, expecting a more compact size. nope, they are quite big. my former headphones were AKG K451, which were a lot smaller in size. the other thing I would complain about is the wire, which is a bit on the bulky side, including the remote control, which does absolutely nothing for me (my sony mp3 payer doesn't run on android).
customer_reviews.author: R. Dumitrescu

customer_reviews.title: Great right up until the remote fails.
customer_reviews.text: These were lovely, the sound is good, they're comfy.... For about 2 months. Then the wire/remote starts to fail. So for a quick fix I just bought a new wire. Now 4 weeks into that it's starting to become intermittently faulty. I don't treat them harshly, they spend most of their life either on my head or desk and yet the connection still fails. Giving up and buying a different set.
customer_reviews.author: Hattietty

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very good on-ear headphones for this great price. The sound is clean with deep bass and they are comfortable to wear even for many hours. Very stilish and light, built with strong materials and perfect to travel around with public transports: they have a great isolation, the right size and a detachable cable. Very comfortable also if you wear glasses, after some hours your ears could sweat though. Sometimes, on high sounds, could be not exactly the best, but it happens when music is playing very loudly and just with some kind of music/instrument. I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: stefania

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Sennheiser for years, had the same headphones as these which I broke and felt like just getting a new pair. Never had any issues with them, except the wire which id change every few months. When these arrived it was perfect, I threw away the box expecting it to work but after few days the left side stopped playing music. It would come on and off but mostly off. Thought it was the wire so I ordered one to replace it, needless to say the new wire didn't change anything. Very disappointed with this product and myself for throwing the box away so no refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but faulty
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are of good quality, comfortable and work as intended. Although after a while the faults begin to emerge, namely the wire remote just stops working after around a month. Also recently the left side (the side where the wire goes in) of my headphones just stopped working as well so i will be using the 2 year warranty already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not made to last
customer_reviews.text: When first arrived I was more than happy with the product. However after two months the right earphone started to play up, specifically making fuzzy noises. After three months of use the left followed suit, after six months now they are completely broken. I've used senheiser before and usually had no problems, maybe I received a faulty pair? I wrote to amazon about there returns policy, due to being under one year old, yet to hear back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOUGH
customer_reviews.text: I've had other headphone and these are by far one of the toughest I've had. My daughters had hers for 2 years now and as you know the lead in is a concern for most. This provides one lead going into the ear phone and locking, which is a huge advantage. I love these.
customer_reviews.author: mr

customer_reviews.title: Better than Beats Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Was lucky enough to get these at £40 the other week, they've been in my basket for a few months and pondered if to fork out the £70 they were set at down from £150. Have to say I've used them a fair bit and they are a bargain for the price I got them at, and even if you paid £60-70 I still think they are good. A dam sight better than Beats headphones where you're basically paying for the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbo16

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, style & foldability. Need to be careful with soft ear pieces which come off.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter fir University. She loves the sound, how they look and the fact that they are foldable so she can stuff them into her backpack. Only complaint is that the soft ear pieces come off & she's lost one this weekend so will need to order replacement.
customer_reviews.author: AACLS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well I’m changing my review since the headphones starting to work not as expected. Sound still good but when I use it to talk on the phone, there’s a lot interference if the phone is on my pocket. Need to hold it on my hand and grab the cable so he doesn’t move. Even with that, the connection still bad. Starting to get disappointed with that since I like this item...
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Had to send them back
customer_reviews.text: Wire seemed to be loose causing one of the earpieces not to work. Returned for full refund
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Happy headphone wearer- at last!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as birthday gift after family recommendation. Excellent sound and can be used with various items
customer_reviews.author: Nita White

customer_reviews.title: Control/wire stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought it 3 months ago. Was loving it until last week. Now the control has stopped working and music keeps constantly cutting off. Probably a faulty wire. I am trying to contact Sennheiser to get it replaced (warranty) - not an easy task.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would have expected better quality from Sennheiser
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second pair of these and both have developed the same fault within 2 months! I have used these as you would expect for my commute to work and in both pairs the audio cable has become damaged internally resulting in crackling noises and the controls to stop working. I would have expected better quality from Sennheiser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problem with connecting  cable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter for Christmas 2015. Sound quality is good. The connecting cable has now broken for the third time. The company repaired this on the first occasion, but the postage cost £10. I Have now requested a refund.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Top quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my brother. He loves them. I love them. I now want a pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Dowling

customer_reviews.title: the sound quality is excellent, the bass is powerful and clear
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this headphones for 3 days now, the sound quality is excellent, the bass is powerful and clear , the build material is very good. I've seen many people having problems with the cable, I guess we will live and see 😁
customer_reviews.author: Cosmin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very well made with good sound reproduction. Blocks out background noises well. Very comfortable to wear. Fold for transit. Excellent. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.text: Brought as a gift for the wife. She is more than happy with the fit and also the sound quality is brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Ball1e

customer_reviews.title: A very good buy
customer_reviews.text: These lived up to expectations. Great sound quality regardless of whether you're listening to music or watching a movie. Work for everything. Only downside is they can get uncomfortable after about 2+ hours use, those who wear glasses this effect is increased. Definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Muneeb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I still use these every day in work for voice meetings and music.
customer_reviews.author: brim

customer_reviews.title: On my second pair now in 6 months & the ...
customer_reviews.text: On my second pair now in 6 months & the in-line controls have broken again, do not buy this product! I always look after anything I buy, headphones are stored in the bag when not in use, in-line control/wire is always carefully folded & stored neatly in the bag, give up with this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Look and sound great
customer_reviews.text: Fab, fab, fab sound and look great too. Well worth the money for their quality but not sure why this colour is much more expensive than the red/ blue ones we bought.
customer_reviews.author: Dalinka

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easy to wear, sound is fine but not mind blowing. very well packaged and arrived ahead of time. would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Why me? Faulty headphone
customer_reviews.text: This came in faulty - no sound on right side and sound on the left side very thin with no hint of bass ... maybe because of the defect. Unfortunately returned immediately
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound and they block out a lot of background noise. I like the foldable design. Only negative is they can become slightly uncomfortable after wearing for extended periods, especially with glasses.
customer_reviews.author: David I

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is excellent and is comfortable to wear for long periods of ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent and is comfortable to wear for long periods of time. Build quiality is great and looks and feels really nice. Only downside is the microphone quality seems pretty poor. When using for phone calls, many people have said they can barely hear me and it sounds like it is windy.
customer_reviews.author: Uhsik

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I have had
customer_reviews.text: Noise reduction, comfortable and superior sound. I use these headphones everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Was great for about a month but then the cord stopped ... and then became great again
customer_reviews.text: Was great for about a month but then the cord stopped working and now all the sound is covered in static. Trying to figure out how to contact the seller but having little luck issued, solved. Great Headphones
customer_reviews.author: DJ MC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sounding phones.
customer_reviews.text: Sound really good paired with an iPhone. My son is really pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Man of many guitars

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality product. Build is awful.
customer_reviews.text: Faulty product - audio coming from just one ear on both the pair that came originally and the warranty replacement! Avoid this product it is extremely low quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Filer

customer_reviews.title: Generally good but the connector on the lead is a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Generally good but the connector on the lead is a bit flimsy and because it connects at a right hand angle it is easier to dislodge from the appliance it is attached to than it should be. I also get a bit of reverb sound in the ear pieces when walking.
customer_reviews.author: peter Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Sennheiser Urbanite on ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sennheiser Urbanite on ear headphones - very clear sound, easy to wear for a long period of time. fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Bobcat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ear buds are a bit unconformable after wearing it for a while
customer_reviews.author: carmen carter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bass. But super uncomfortable after an hour of use. Ears start to hurt and I have to remove the headset. Well, that's what you get for buying an on-ear piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality material and sound! A great surprise when I touched them!
customer_reviews.author: Kostas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING HEADPHONES! worth every penny! Most of the in-line Mic features work on my Samsung so that's a bonus
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful experience! Love it! PS:30 pounds cheaper than in John Lewis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from these headphones. Comfortable and sturdy. Delighted with these. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: ... a set bought these for the misses and frankly awesome
customer_reviews.text: I already had a set bought these for the misses and frankly awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Foldable Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Fantastic bass with crisp clean sound highs, great isolation, excellent sturdy build quality, foldable, stylish, adjustable to fit my very large head Cons: Slighty enhanced bass might not please purists. The on-ear design means they start to become a bit uncomfortable after extended wear (2+ hours). Conclusion: I wanted a good pair of foldable headphones & despite the cons, I couldnt find anything else at this price that even came close to giving me all the pros mentioned. buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gezza

customer_reviews.title: Sound great, but really uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These physically make my ears hurt and they get too hot pretty quick. Don't know if I'm wearing it wrong/too long. The sound quality though is amazing, just a shame they have to feel like they're clamping your ears to the side of head to do it. May be better off with the XL version which is over ear
customer_reviews.author: nightcrawler

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality but heavy and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were really good to listen to and look incredible as well. I tried Tidal HIFI and the sound was incredible. However, after about an hour of having them on, they started feeling incredibly uncomfortable. These headphones weigh a lot and as they are on-ear, it caused a bit of discomfort and pain. I ended up returning them. If you don't mind the added weight and are used to such headphones then would definitely recommend them. If not, stay away.
customer_reviews.author: SMFire

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding headphones as usual by Sennheiser great build as ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding headphones as usual by Sennheiser great build as well, i had a slight issue with the remote for an iphone version of these headphones where it was not registering three clicks to play previous song. also be careful unfolding the headphones i caught my finger in the hinge ouch it does hurt. All in all still great headphones apart from the minors. Wouldnt use another brand, Sennheisers are still the best in build and sound.
customer_reviews.author: YabbaDabbaDoo

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these and was originally very pleased, great sound and look but this week while I was traveling to work the sound kept cutting in and out. After some investigation I found that the cable is not connecting properly with the iPhone socket and as its out of the warrenty...I'm out of £70. Absolutely shocking build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mat R

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones - sturdy and comfy, good sound and clearly well made. Only missing a star as quite tight on my head (and I don't wear big hats so I don't think I have a big head!)
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Cable started going funny after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: Cable started going funny after a couple of months. When I walk around with it, or use it when I ride my bike, the sound drops every 10 seconds or so. It looks like a good product but it actually isn't. I found out online that a lot of people are having the same problem and end up buying a new cable which, of course, doesn't solve the problem. My girlfriend also bought the same headphone and is also having problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality - broken within 7 months
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very poor. The first pair lasted about 16 months, these have lasted 7 months. The cover comes off of the ear pieces, the cable gets crackly. Not at all what you would expect from Sennheiser AND they have put the price up quite considerably since I bought these in April. I will not be wasting money on Sennheiser products again.
customer_reviews.author: KarenKM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones by Sennheiser
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones by Sennheiser. Confortable and with deep, round but clear bass. The bass is boosted a little bit but overall the sound is very balanced with very clear highs and good mids. Works perfectly with any smartphone since it's optimized for small electronic gadgets. Recomend to anyone who listens to music on the go since it is foldable and easy to move around in its pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looked great. Only one speaker worked. Sent it back. Hope you have better luck than we did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've used
customer_reviews.text: Very clear and cuts out most back ground noise as I travel on the underground. Volume adjacent works well too. Best headphones I've used.
customer_reviews.author: PaulS

customer_reviews.title: Got two faulty pairs in one order
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe this, but I got the same exact issue as the other 1 star reviewer - ordered two pairs, for me and the girlfriend, and they were both faulty. Only got sound from one ear on both pairs of headphones; tested on multiple devices - phones, tablets, PC, PS4 - with no luck. Requested a replacement from Amazon, I sincerely hope they won't be broken as well, as it happened to the other unlucky buyer, because I'm looking forward to using these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had two pairs now. Straight out of the box ...
customer_reviews.text: Had two pairs now. Straight out of the box and the right side doesn't work at all, left side doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one ear cannot be used
customer_reviews.text: The left ear is broken and cannot be used, the right one is fine and excellent. There must be somewhere wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality, not a resilient product - do not ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned three times, very poor quality, not a resilient product - do not buy under any circumstances!
customer_reviews.author: Sar78

customer_reviews.title: perfect blend of qualities
customer_reviews.text: For £150 i wanted headphones that would sound, look and feel great while being durable enough to last a long time travelling around. £150 wont buy perfection and some classical pieces do sound a little veiled but the clarity of bass and top frequencies gives details I've never heard before, in a lot of songs. Plus i couldnt imagine a pair of headphones being more portable or durable. I use them on the tube and compared with the momentums the urbanites have far better passive noise isolation. Wearing them doesnt shut out everything (if you care about avoiding tinnitus) but has detail to make you feel theres a band in your head.
customer_reviews.author: spong9

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Only one ear phone working
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Only one ear phone working. Broke after only 6 weeks of use. Not impressed for a high quality Product and a christmas present. Back to Bose equipment
customer_reviews.author: Steve Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones But Not To My Taste
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality, excellent design, very comfortable... But they do not sound like what you would expect Sennheiser headphones to sound like. They are not flat or natural... These are style cans and if you like that kind of thing these are good. They sound better than Beats but they are in that same ballpark. Basically everything about them is great and what you would expect from Sennheiser... Except the sound. They did a good job doing what they did and I imagine younger people would like these a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like these more, but returned.
customer_reviews.text: First off let me say, I ended up purchasing the Urbanite XLs and I love them. I purchased these to replace a pair of Beats on ears that died. They sounded great and the red, white and blue looked very cool. Comfort was the issue for me. I work in an office environment and listen to music, sometimes for hours, while working on contracts and generating reports. These were a bit snug on my head and where uncomfortable with glasses. I got the over ear version of these headphones and they are great. If you don't wear glasses or just love on ear cans, these are great but comfort may be a factor.
customer_reviews.author: David Colgrove

customer_reviews.title: Better than their famous competition, and it ain’t close
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking and sounding headphones. Sonically they’re pretty much what Beats solo headphones claim to be. Take that to mean deep, tight bass and crystal clear mids and highs. I am a little concerned about durability. One of the ear pads became detached shortly after I bought them. That said, Amazon quickly sent me a new pair. I like them enough that upon the arrival of my new pair I immediately ordered a pair for the wife. Oh yeah. The price is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: DontPanic

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the Momentum over ear first and liked the sound but didn't love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Momentum over ear first and liked the sound but didn't love it. The highs were too sharp for me and the lows not "warm" enough. Moreover, I listen to music while traveling in NYC subways, and the Momentums let in too much ambient noise. I switched the Urbanites and the difference is palpable in terms of how the music sounds. It is much warmer and I don't seem to lose any details. My on-ear Urbanites, surprisingly, cut more ambient noise than the over ear Momentums did. The urbanites look a tad big on my smallish head, but I don't mind it.
customer_reviews.author: Anuprof

customer_reviews.title: These pinch!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent. Fit on my head and over my ears is excellent. I would have given 5 stars except for one small problem. In the few days I've had and used these headphones I have pinched myself 3 times at the fold point when unfolding them. The folding feature is awesome, makes these headphones very portable, but the fold point is sharp and hurts when you accidentally catch your fingers in the joint. In addition the fold points are located right where both of your hands would be placed when unfolding the ear parts making it very easy to get pinched.
customer_reviews.author: Kamala

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good for less than $100
customer_reviews.text: The Urbanite headphones sound great, and they're decent at blocking out noise (they're not active noise cancelling headphones). They store easy and the materials are all high quality except for the ear pads - mine are disintegrating and leaving block material on my the side of my face and desk. Overall, I got a good pair headphones without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: rjrollins13

customer_reviews.title: Great on ears for mobile devices.
customer_reviews.text: Music is my first love. Much of my listening these days is with headphones through my IPhone and IPad. Since I haven't blown any money on audio lately I decided to splurge. I got the V-Moda M100 and XS. I got the B&W P5S2 and P7. I got the Sennheiser Momentum Over Ears and I got these babies the Sennheiser Urbanite On Ear. These are fantastic and don't take a back seat to any of the others. Great sound and comfort. Perfect for mobile devices. 5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Camino

customer_reviews.title: Still my favorite after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: great Sounding headphones. Initially I thought the earpads were a little firm, but after using it for a week it is actualy very comfortable. Noise isolation is excellent. Update: I have had it for over two years now, it is still my favorite after using many other big name headphones like Bose, Sony, Vmoda ''' I love the sound signature and the best sound isolation without active noise canceling. I prefer to bring these with me on a flight over my Bose QC25 because of the sound quality. The build quality is top notch too, mine still looks brand new even without using a hard case.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous sounds, but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: These block sound very well just sitting on the ear. The sound quality is absolutely stunning. They are very comfortable on the ear. They are fairly heavy though. Also with my Android phone I cannot adjust the volume from the built in volume buttons. I still love them though.
customer_reviews.author: Myke Corwin

customer_reviews.title: Great Sounding Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely the best sounding headphones I've ever owned. They are pretty balanced but have a slight curve, which I like for general listening. I have a pair of Audio Technica monitors that I use when I want reference sound, but for music and especially mobile listening these sound better to the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Garcia

customer_reviews.title: ... centric but they are not and that is a good thing because I find them to be fairly balanced ...
customer_reviews.text: There are meant to be bass centric but they are not and that is a good thing because I find them to be fairly balanced the highs are a little recessed but what you can hear is good quality the mids are really well represented and even though they are not what I consider to be a bass heavy the bass is definitely accurate and has presence I like these headphones quite a bit my only issue is that they don't secure tightly to your head if you bend over they will fall off
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Vokits

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed in not only this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones just over a month ago, and the speaker cable/mic has already stopped working. I am very disappointed in not only this purchase, but the fact that there was a 30-day window which I could return them. Now I've got a pair of useless $80 headphones. Also, the so-called tangle free cable is probably one of the worse cables I've dealt with. Yes, it's flat. No, it is not tangle free.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pair of headphones in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who wears glasses, I've always had trouble finding comfortable headphones. These are fantastic. Comfortable, easy to clean, great sound, and look great. Can't complain! WARNING: Don't leave them (or any electronics) on your car seat exposed to sunlight on a super hot day. My cable melted, but that's my fault and not the headphones :D
customer_reviews.author: Luciano Robles

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones with velvety earmuffs. Great quality of sound and decent sound proofing. Work great for my office use!
customer_reviews.author: N. Donin

customer_reviews.title: Can recommend with a couple of reservations
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound. Solid build. Very comfortable for an on-ear headphone. I deducted a star because (1) it's easy to pinch your fingers in the hinges, and (2) the ear pads fall off easily (and are a pain to put back on). Inexcusable design flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I have purchased for its price.
customer_reviews.text: I really love the sound quality of the product. Also sennheiser did a great job at selecting material for this product as well. It is does contain plastic but it is a high quality thick plastic that does not feel cheap at all, the headband is constructed out of a high quality cloth and rubber which really feels nice. I am very satisfied but I do not like the fact that after listening for about 1-2 hours, your ears start hurting. But of course, most headphones do that so I have no problem with that. Hope this helped
customer_reviews.author: Ted Jeong

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones! After doing a lot of research on "on ear" headphones, I chose the Sennheiser because of comfort and sound. It was the right choice. I use them on the treadmill and weight training listening to workout music. The sound, particularly the bass, is incredible. You will not go wrong with these headphones....much better then "in ear."
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Michael Rose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for portable use
customer_reviews.text: These are very warm and U-shaped cans. Excellent for portable use, and a better alternative to beats. Build quality is excellent. Materials, fit and finish easily surpass dre's offerings, while providing a similar sound signature with perhaps a touch more clarity. It's a good bass-head can on the go, and very easy to drive.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Really great sound. Though they are not actively "noise-cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Really great sound. Though they are not actively "noise-cancelling," these headphones definitely block many outside sounds. The inline remote doesn't work with my Nexus 5x, but the description never claimed that it would.
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with TV audio output jack (3.5 mm TRS)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Sennheiser Urbanite headphones to listen to TV which has a 3.5 mm TRS output jack. The TRRS connector on the Urbanites is not compatible. The description should have been more explicit in that these headphones work only with mobile devices that have TRRS output jacks. I spent several hours looking for an adaptor and will return the headphones unless someone can suggest such an adaptor. A long cable with a TRRS jack and TRS plug would be preferred.
customer_reviews.author: SitaL

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: For the price you won’t find a better set of ear cans. Thumping bass and good miss & highs. Blows away the Beats in my opinion. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Toby W. Yates

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great
customer_reviews.text: Sound great. You can listen to loud music without annoying the person next to you on the bus. The only issue is they cover your ear so well that in the wet heat of the summer my ears are super sweaty. The in line remote is also great.
customer_reviews.author: gk28

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something that produces music as it is and is very comfortable to use than this should be on your list, they do not have overpowering bass as some other brands do. I got the IOS version but right now I am using an android phone so cannot comment about the volume keys but the play pause button works fine. I have also not used it for making calls so cannot say anything about the mic quality.
customer_reviews.author: Abhineet

customer_reviews.title: So I got these he's 13 yrs old and said they are better than the beats he had and was very happy ...
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for step son instead of beats. He already had a pair of them and they didn't last long. So I got these he's 13 yrs old and said they are better than the beats he had and was very happy he got these !!! I was happy cause I didn't pay a arm an leg and I have to say they sound great
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price; and then some.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best earphones I've ever had. Listening to the Brandenburg concertos or to Squirrel Nut Zippers, the audio quality places me both in the concert hall and the jazz club -- a miracle in accoustical engineering. ... I read some of the comments had trouble with getting stereo audio quality -- that's because the connection cable input has to be twisted and locked into the earphone -- a feature that I absolutely love because I can wear the earphones while I'm walking without having to worry that the wire will get disconnected inadvertently. ... In short, well worth the price. And then some.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Manda

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound! Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, comfy, unique, good looking and all around good sound. Good bass for the type of music with the bass you wanna hear, and other music the "all around" sound is good as well, so worth the money on the price drop for sure sure.
customer_reviews.author: THE PHOENIX N7

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best headphones in the market. You need to compare with other high end brands to know the difference. I listen to just about every genre of music.The bass is somewhat emphasized but does not drown out any of the other notes. This was the first time i could actually the breath of an artist on the track. Excellent product for anyone who loves music.
customer_reviews.author: Bugyei

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sound. Just one flaw after awhile the the right earpad became lose. Now it has happened twice
customer_reviews.author: RohanD

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well at first, but after about 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well at first, but after about 6 months my cord doesn't work well. The sound cuts in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely tight during the first week.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound is awesome. The only problem was they didn't fit my head at the beginning. After just 15 minutes they started hurting my ears a lot (I consider my head average sized). After stretching them for a week according to this article, they got much better: [...] I you have very sensitive ears I recommend using over the ear Urbanite headphones instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is excellent. They are a little heavy but very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent. They are a little heavy but very comfortable. The price is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Pancho Leon

customer_reviews.title: Gave on-ears a chance, was not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: awesome headphones. Amazing sound considering they are bass focused. They have surprisingly open soundstage. Highly recommended if you want some good headphones that offer pristine bass.
customer_reviews.author: Nes

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are truly a pleasure to listen to music with. They made very well and feel very durable. The sound they emit is amazing and very clear. Comfortable to wear, as well.
customer_reviews.author: JosephS

customer_reviews.title: Great Cans at the Perfect Price
customer_reviews.text: Shipped a day early! Extremely happy with purchase! Thought this was fake since the headphones are normally 200 dollars and they were around 40 here, but product came working perfect! Definitely would recommend to anyone! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lousy material
customer_reviews.text: Bought on July 22, 2017, the ear muff material started to flake off on Jan. 17, 2019.
customer_reviews.author: joe123

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality but could be a bit lighter
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I put these headphones on, the first thing I noticed was the blocking out of all sound around me. They muffled all noise and when I started playing music, the song was the only thing I could hear. The sound quality is great, you can hear all the highs and lows very clearly (the volume output is also fairly high). The only complaint I have, and the reason I only gave this a 4 star review, is they are a bit heavy. These headphones become uncomfortable after about an hour
customer_reviews.author: hogg2u

customer_reviews.title: These headphones work great. They are very portable and fold up nicely
customer_reviews.text: These headphones work great. They are very portable and fold up nicely. Only complaint I had was that they did pinch and would make my ears hurt. Others that tried them did not have the same complaint. but the suggestion I got was to stretch them out to take off pressure. These headphones are durable and can be stretched to be just about a straight line. Very sturdy and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: as the expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: you can feel that they are as good as the expensive ones
customer_reviews.author: a. b. s.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and sound of this headphone but...
customer_reviews.text: Have this headphone for seven months now... Love the look and sound of this headphone but the microphone is no longer working. Also getting a lot of noises when walking around because connector is loose. Really disappointed on how quickly it deteriorates. Used to love this headphone but think it's just ok now
customer_reviews.author: MJordan2324

customer_reviews.title: great look, great feel, and even greater sound.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! They look nice, are easy to take around (extremely portable), are comfortable to wear for medium amount of time (I wouldnt wear them for more than four hours), and of course the sound is top quality. The bass is perfectly punchy, and yet doesnt compromise the rest of the sounds. It's great! Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality was great. The construction and material seem to be durable
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was great. The construction and material seem to be durable. I love the colors. I would have given them a five except when wearing them for long periods of time, they hurt my ears and I was constantly adjusting them to get comfortable. I am going to try the XLs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Sennheiser Urbanite On-Ear Headphones for iPhone/iPod/iPad Devices - Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:For Apple iOS Devices| Colour Name:Black

Available in a Choice of Colours, It's All in the Detail, Easy Music and Calls URBANITE MOBILE STEREO ON-EAR HEADPHONES FOR IPHONE/IPOD/IPAD
The URBANITE mobile stereo headphone range delivers an intense club sound, serving up massive bass but with Sennheiser’s uncompromising audio expertise ensuring excellent clarity through the entire frequency range.

LEARN MORE ABOUT THE URBANITE SERIES
URBANITE headphones are for those that love their tunes heavy and love to look good, but who always respect great sound. The URBANITE range is ideal for staying connected on the move, with integrated in-line remote controls and microphones for taking calls and controlling music on Apple smartphones and tablets, with a dedicated version for iPhone/iPod/iPad. This is the sound your ears have been waiting for… Sennheiser URBANITE. Let your ears be loved.

FEATURES
 * Take your club sound with you – massive bass and clear treble
 * companion – extra rugged for robust urban living
 * Stay connected – control your music and calls
 * Fits your lifestyle – fold them up and go
 * Available in your choice of colours - black, denim, sand, nation and plum
 * Compatibility - available with detachable cable with 3-button remote control and integrated microphone for either iPhone/iPod/iPad
 * Easy to store and bring along – the foldable design makes it easy to collapse and store in the supplied soft pouch
 * Bold design - robust quality of premium stainless steel hinge and aluminium slider

DID YOU KNOW?
 Sennheiser’s URBANITE headphones are the choice for great sound, deep bass, and urban style on the move.

SENNHEISER RECOMMENDS THIS HEADPHONE FOR...
… stylish young users of Apple devices seeking bass driven sound and urban design.

COMPATIBILITY
URBANITE is compatible with Apple devices: all iPod, iPhone and iPad models. The full functionality of the Smart Remote Control is supported by the following models: iPhone 5S, iPhone 5C, iPhone 5, iPhone 4S, iPhone 4, iPhone 3GS, iPad mini, iPad (3rd generation or later), iPad 2, iPad, iPod touch* (2nd generation or later), iPod classic, iPod nano *,** (4th generation or later), iPod shuffle *,** (3rd generation or later).

* Requires the latest iPod software.

** Only remote and voiceover functions.


Urbanite
For Apple iOSFor Samsung Galaxy 
Urbanite XL
For Apple iOSFor Samsung Galaxy Audio Channels Stereo Stereo Frequency response 16Hz – 22kHz 16Hz – 22kHz Transducer principle Dynamic, closed Dynamic, closed Design On-ear Around-ear Volume control Smart in-line remote Smart in-line remote Microphone type In-line Microphone In-line Microphone Pick-up pattern Omni-directional microphone Omni-directional microphone Connectors 3.5mm low profile angled plug 3.5mm low profile angled plug Weight 260 g 315 g Accessories Soft pouch Soft pouch Note:Cable of the headphone has a special bayonet plug. It has to be connected the way shown in the 5th image on the detail page.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Sennheiser Urbanite XL Headphone
1.2m remote cable
soft pouch
feature_bullets: Take your club sound with you - massive bass and clear treble
Tough companion - extra rugged for robust urban living
Fits your busy lifestyle - simply fold up to fit into your bag
Your choice of eye-catching colours and either on-ear or around-ear design  - customise your look and your sound
